meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a phantom.
meanings.sent1: The misty figure in the haunted house was phantomlike.
meanings.sent2: The ghostly apparition had a phantomlike quality.
meanings.sent3: The phantomlike shadow seemed to play hide-and-seek with the moonlight.
meanings.sent4: Her memories of him were phantomlike, fading with each passing day.
meanings.sent5: The eerie silence of the graveyard was filled with phantomlike whispers.

meanings.definition: Having the appearance or qualities of a phantom.
meanings.sent1: The mysterious figure in the fog was phantomlike.
meanings.sent2: The spooky castle had a phantomlike atmosphere.
meanings.sent3: The phantomlike cat prowled the dark alley, its eyes glowing in the night.
meanings.sent4: His sudden appearance at the party was phantomlike, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent5: The old painting had a phantomlike quality, as if the subject could come to life at any moment.
